On Thu, 15 Jul 2004 06:12:07 -0700 (PDT), Richardson Paul$B$5$s(B wrote:
>HI 
>
>lord zev makes no mention of Jitte
>
>and I think they are correctly termed - Jutte

It's properly 'jitte'. The word jyuu (10) becomes 'jitsu' $B$8$D(B or 
'jitt' $B$8$C(B in compound words. For instance the Ten Commandments are 
'jikkai' $B==2|(B
